content: **crocheted shawl in drops sky piece is crocheted with lace pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern skip-071 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** height measured along the middle = approx 70 cm width measured along the top side from side to side = approx 150 cm **materials** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200 g colour 12 denim blue **crochet gauge ** 18 treble crochets in width and 9 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 mm hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
